website_summaries.verdict: Zagg's foray into a folio-style keyboard case for the iPad 2, the Zaggfolio, succeeds when it's in keyboard mode. However, it's not ideal as a pure case.
pros: The Zaggfolio folio-style keyboard case for the iPad 2 has an excellent keyboard and docks the iPad 2 perfectly into its design
The back cover's breakaway lower section adds support for the iPad 2 when in keyboard mode
cons: As a case, the Zaggfolio feels flimsy and clunky compared with far better alternatives.
The embedded magnet isn't that helpful for turning the iPad 2 on
in fact, it was a little annoying

customer_reviews.title: Works for typing, but does not protect iPad
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for hard case that is no longer available. Does not encompass or protect iPad. Keypad works easily. IPad stands up against folded back of case. Prefer case that iPad goes inside of. Might be wrong case for my model
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Great Design
customer_reviews.text: I've now had my Zaggfolio for about a month and I just love it. The case keeps it well protected and the keyboard is wonderful use to bring to a coffee shop or something to enable me to stay productive while leaving my laptop behind. One of the things I really like about this design is that while it keeps the Ipad secure it also allows easy removing of the Ipad, which I do often because its much more comfortable to read on the Ipad naked or with just the smart cover.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Koefod

customer_reviews.title: Not that great for the price...
customer_reviews.text: The fit and finish of this case is not worth the price. The "sticker" they slap on the plastic case overlaps the edges and looks like crap. If you just need to use the iPad, its too flimsy. Once you open it up, it comes off the bottom half of the case assuming that every time you open it up you're going to use the keyboard. The keyboard is great. No problems with the keyboard. Battery is great. For the price, the case should have had a better fit and finish and not just some carbon fiber looking sticker.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Zag iPad keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this keyboard for my husband. After using the keyboard, he had trouble charging the keyboard as you have to take the keyboard out, which is hard to do. We are not too happy about this aspect. The other problem is that you can not use your headphones while using the keyboard. It would be easier if there were cutouts for the headphones and if the keyboard could be charged while in the case. This is poorly designed. If I had known all this I would have bought a different keyboard. Please look into redesigning this keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Gierens

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase from this vendor - I believe I was sent a used product
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived missing the USB to mini USB charger and documentation . I can't get the keyboard to sync to my iPad. I believe this is a used and repackaged product. I was moving at the time I ordered this and didn't get a chance to test the unit in time. Return expired after 30 days. If I remember correctly this product was supposed to be Amazon Prime. It didn't arrive in a few days. I have a lot of friends that successfully use the Zagg keyboard for their iPads.Purchase it somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with my purchase of the Zaggfolio for iPad2 - first off the material on the cover is not attached good so on some of the corners the material is popping up. Secondly, when I type a single letter such as "t" I get a "y". I have emailed Zagg and have yet to get a response. I am very frustrated with this purchase. I just called Zagg and spoke to someone in Customer Support - they were very helpful and tested the pairing of my keyboard. The issue with the incorrect letters typing was not resolved. They are sending me another keyboard for me to switch out and return defected keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Shudson

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: When I started researching covers for my iPad I was completely unsure of what to get. There are so many great products out there that seemed to all do the same thing. I decided on the Zaggfolio because it appeared to cover all sides of the iPad, had the keyboard and seemed pretty sturdy. From the pictures I was concerned about how easily they made it look to slide the iPad out of the case. I didn't want it sliding out that easily. Well, it has done everything I want and it doesn't slide out nearly as easy as they made it look. I definetly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits the new 3rd Gen iPad
customer_reviews.text: The new iPad is only 0.03" thicker than iPad 2 so I figured I was okay, but you never know. The fit and finish is a perfect compliment to your new iPad 3rd Gen. I tested this case on the following iPads: iPad with Wi-Fi + 4G LTE for Verizon 16GB - Black (3rd generation)- MC733LL/A iPad with Wi-Fi + 4G LTE for Verizon 64GB - Black (3rd generation) - MC756LL/A The Zaggfolio for iPad 2 is a PERFECT fit for the new iPads!
customer_reviews.author: Rokfrd

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Keyboard and case
customer_reviews.text: This product provides an excellent keyboard for the iPad. The keyboard feels like a regular keyboard and the keys are spaced very well. They are spaced far enough apart that when I type I don't hit other keys. I have owned other keyboards for the iPad and they have a rubbery feel and the keys are close together so that when I type I hit more than one key. I have used this keyboard and case for the past few months and have recommend that our department purchase them for our iPad users.
customer_reviews.author: MJKallas

customer_reviews.title: Zagg hit this one out of the park!
customer_reviews.text: The ZaggFolio is the pinnacle of wireless keyboard and folio design. It is light, slim and stylish. The form and function is superb and the battery life is supernatural. I had the original aluminum ZaggMate keyboard for almost 9 months prior to purchasing the ZaggFolio and I only charged the keyboard twice and that only took 20 minutes. It appears that the ZaggFolio keyboard is much the same. I can't recommend this product high enough.

The issue I have, at least on the one I received, is the workmanship on the material that connects to the plastic rim. You can see the white stitching around the perimeter of the device which has since pulled away in one location. I'm not sure what I'll do next (send it back as a return/defect or replace it).

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ipad Accessory Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed as this keyboard lived up to my expectations. It came professionally packaged and the directions for installation were easy. I wish amazon would have had the variety of colors available on the Zagg website, but amazon offered a faster delivery which is what I needed over the color of the case. Very happy with this purchase.

According to the documentation, I may have to charge it three or four times a year... impressive.

You can use the case without those little pieces, but it would be better with them. The iPad would hold in place more firmly. It was WAY too easy to make that mistake. If you buy it, slide the tablet in, don't try to click it into place.

customer_reviews.title: Everything I was looking for

I would think that there would be a recess in the case to expose the plug-in area like there is to plug in the iPad itself. Minor point all-in-all.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase

product_meta.title: ZAGG ZAGGfolio for Apple iPad 2 - Carbon with Black Keyboard (FOLCARBLK97)
product_meta.description: Created with a stylish design and a durable microfiber lining, the ZAGGfolio is an impressively thin multi-function iPad folio case for Apple iPad 2, complete with a removable Bluetooth keyboard and a built-in stand system, ideal for on-the-go use.
feature_bullets: Space-saving keyboard designed for fast and accurate typing, supports iPad 2 in both landscape and portrait orientation.
The removeable iPad keyboard works in combination with the built-in stand to give you the most flexibility of use.
Easy to connect and easy to use, the Bluetooth keyboard allows you to stay connected whether your keyboard is in the iPad 2 folio case or not.
IPad 2 specific keyboard shortcuts include volume control, music control, home, search, copy and paste.
Rechargeable built-in keyboard battery provides weeks of use between charges.
Type with the keyboard in, or out of the folio. Or just use the folio alone as a stand.
What's In the Box: iPad folio with removable bluetooth wireless keyboard (battery included), USB to micro-USB charging cable, User documentation
ZAGGfolio Bluetooth keyboard uses a 510 mAh rechargeable lithium polymer battery that will last several weeks with normal use.
